abstract: Judge Rakoff ruled that Rajat K. Gupta, the former Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble director, can proceed with a lawsuit that accuses the Securities and Exchange Commission of violating his constitutional rights.
snippet: Judge Rakoff ruled that Rajat K. Gupta, the former Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble director, can proceed with a lawsuit that accuses the Securities and Exchange Commission of violating his constitutional rights.
lead_paragraph: “A funny thing happened on the way to this forum.”

headline.main: Rakoff Allows Gupta’s Lawsuit Against S.E.C. to Proceed
